aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.storyContent: Founded as a visionary e-commerce venture, our company has rapidly evolved into a premier destination for discerning customers seeking high-quality beauty products and cutting-edge home appliances. Our journey of growth is underpinned by an unwavering commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction.
aboutUs.missionContent: We aim to provide high-quality beauty and home products to our customers, focusing on customer satisfaction and innovation.
aboutUs.commitmentContent: We are committed to providing the best shopping experience for our customers, ensuring quality and excellent service.

unclaimableProducts.title: Unclaimable Products
unclaimableProducts.explanation: Unclaimable products are items that cannot be returned or exchanged due to health and safety reasons or personal use.
unclaimableProducts.policyContent: To ensure the safety and hygiene of all our customers, we do not accept returns or exchanges for unclaimable products.
unclaimableProducts.supportContent: If you have any questions about unclaimable products, please contact our customer support team.

whyUs.title: Why Us?
whyUs.qualityContent: We source only the best products for our customers, ensuring quality and performance.
whyUs.deliveryContent: We ensure quick and reliable delivery for all your orders.
whyUs.paymentsContent: Your transactions are always safe with us, using the latest security technologies.
whyUs.satisfactionContent: We prioritize our customers' happiness and strive to provide an exceptional shopping experience.
whyUs.promiseContent: At our company, we promise to provide an exceptional shopping experience with high-quality products and excellent customer service.
